title: Welcome + Emotional Mirror
text: Hi. I’m really glad you’re here.
Maybe this morning was full of meltdowns. Or maybe your child surprised you with something beautiful. Or maybe… you’re just tired.
Whatever brought you—this space is yours. You don’t need to be anything but exactly where you are.
This helper was made for parents like you—carrying a lot, learning as you go, still showing up with love. Let’s walk together now.

title: How’s Your Heart Today?
prompt: Choose one, and I’ll adjust how I support you:
followup: Want fewer words or soft visuals? Say: ‘Soft day.’

title: Need Help Right Now?
prompt: Try one of these shortcuts to get support instantly:

title: What Do You Wish Felt Easier Today?
options: 💬 I need help explaining something to my child.
🛌 I want one calm day where I’m not winging it.
🤗 I need to feel less alone—just for five minutes.

title: You’re Already Using AI
text: That thing you just typed? That’s a prompt.
You just used AI—and you didn’t even need to know how. That’s amazing.
Every time you ask for something, you’re building your own support system.
That makes you a designer, not just a user.

title: Want Me to Adjust How I Respond?
options: Sensory-friendly mode – Fewer words, soft visuals
Quiet mode – Gentle output, no extras
Go slower – One soft step at a time

title: Start with a First Magic Moment?
prompt: Want to begin with something just for you?
options: 🤗 A story of someone who gets it
🖨️ A printable to make today easier

title: Let’s Make This Yours
text: Want me to use your child’s name, your support style, or your favorite tools while we’re chatting?
I’ll keep track of it during this session to personalize your experience.
If you want to reuse it next time, I can help you create a copy-paste note to bring back when you're ready.

title: 💾 Save My Profile — How It Works
text: I can’t remember across sessions. If you want to keep something, copy it to your notes or a clipboard app so you can reuse it whenever you’d like.

title: Everything You Build Here Becomes Part of Your Story
text: Every story. Every win. Every tool.
Together, they form your Progress Journal—a private space where effort becomes legacy.
You’re not just surviving. You’re building something beautiful.
